text:
Agriculture Minister M. Chandracasu inaugurated road development works at two places in the district at a total outlay of about Rs.22 lakh. A release said that Rs. 7.44 lakh has been sanctioned for developing Narikambai in Nedungadu, Rs.14.56 lakh would be utilised for developing Poovam Yadhaval Road in Kottucherry.

Flower show on February 5

A three-day flower show will commence here on February 5. Collector E. Vallavan on Friday held a consultative meeting with the officials for evolving arrangements for the show. He said that dance recitals and cultural programmes would form part of the entertainment events at the show.
title: Road development works inaugurated
